silive.com/2015/04/staten-island-road-ra.snippet: Andrew Scharf and Sierra Dinneen were the winners of the weekly SIAC Run for Fun Saturday at Clove Lakes Park. Scharf covered the three-mile course in 17:12, while Kenneth Morella (17:48) and David Michaels (18:02) placed second and third overall.
